short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture the visible content of the active tab on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Screenshot Taker is an easy-to-use Chrome extension designed to help users quickly capture the visible content of their active tab. Whether you need to save an image, a design element, or just remember something you found on the web, Web Screenshot Taker makes it effortless.

Key features:
1. Capture visible content in just one click
2. Works on all websites
3. Downloads screenshots as .png files
4. Lightweight and unobtrusive

To use Web Screenshot Taker, simply click on the extension icon, and it will automatically capture the visible content of the active tab and download it as a .png file. It's that simple!
